mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.username AS username,A.realname AS realname,A.password AS password,A.sex AS sex,A.avatar AS avatar,A.avatar_pic_id AS avatarPicId,A.email AS email,A.login_name AS loginName,A.phone AS phone,A.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime,A.qq AS qq,A.weixin AS weixin,A.weibo AS weibo,A.qr_code AS qrCode,A.qr_code2 AS qrCode2,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.address AS address,A.id_card AS idCard,A.position_ids AS positionIds,A.position_names AS positionNames,A.title_ids AS titleIds,A.title_names AS titleNames,A.hospital_id AS hospitalId,A.department_id AS departmentId,A.good_at_ids AS goodAtIds,A.good_at AS goodAt,A.education_code AS educationCode,A.consult_scope AS consultScope,A.tags AS tags,A.words AS words,A.introduction AS introduction,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.main_ids AS mainIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.attr_num AS attrNum,A.attr_date AS attrDate,A.attr_datetime AS attrDatetime,A.sequence AS sequence,A.description AS description,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

,pca.area_name AS provinceName, pca1.area_name AS cityName, h.whole_name AS hospitalName, d.name AS departmentName, pca2.area_name AS hospitalProvinceName, IF(A.sex = 1,"男",IF(A.sex = 2,"女","其他")) AS sexName, h.logo AS hospitalLogo, (SELECT count(*) FROM consult c WHERE A.id = c.doctor_id AND c.main_status = 2) AS consultCount, d1.code_name AS titleNames
,f.fans_id AS fansId

LEFT JOIN hospital h ON A.hospital_id = h.id LEFT JOIN department d ON A.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON A.province = pca.id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca1 ON A.city = pca1.id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca2 ON h.province = pca2.id LEFT JOIN dict d1 ON A.title_ids = d1.id LEFT JOIN dict d2 ON A.education_code = d2.code
LEFT JOIN fans f ON A.id = f.fans_id AND f.main_status = 1 AND f.user_id = #{fansUserId}
mapper.select:
SELECT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diagnose WHERE doctor_id = A.id) AS diagnoseCount, (SELECT SUM(medical_total_price) FROM diagnose WHERE doctor_id = A.id) AS diagnoseTotalPrice FROM A
WHERE 1=1

SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:

username, realname, password, sex, avatar, avatar_pic_id, email, login_name, phone, last_login_time, qq, weixin, weibo, qr_code, qr_code2, province, city, address, id_card, position_ids, position_names, title_ids, title_names, hospital_id, department_id, good_at_ids, good_at, education_code, consult_scope, tags, words, introduction, serial, type_id, link_id, group_id, grade_id, main_status, logic_status, attr_decimal, main_ids, attr_str, attr_str2, attr_int, attr_int2, attr_num, attr_date, attr_datetime, sequence, description, remark, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by,
